game.name: Medic Mayhem
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 장난감 구급차 액션과 혼돈의 물리 엔진. 생명을 구해 전쟁에서 승리하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Toy soldiers fight on chaotic battlefields and you're the medic! Four player local coop with friends and bots. Win the war by saving lives!
